alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING AND SOUTHEASTERN TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Canton to near Jersey Shore. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ralston, Waterville, Ogdensburg, Trout Run, Buttonwood, Little Pine State Park, Liberty and Salladasburg. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
